subject: Attn:
body:
Attn:
This is to inform you that i am in charge of the entire payment and I came
across your file which was marked X
and your released disk painted RED, I took time to study it
and found out that you have paid VIRTUALLY all fees and but
the fund was not released to you.
The most annoying thing is that they won't tell you the truth
that on no account will they ever release the fund to
you,instead they allow you spend money unnecessarily,I do
not intend to work here all the days of my life, I can
release this fund to you if you can comply with me.
I needed to do this because you need to know the status of your Funds and
cause for the delay,
The only thing needed to release this fund is The Original Copy of
your signed FUND RELEASE CLASSIFIED DOCUMENT which will be tendered to
the paying officer to transfer your fund amount into your bank
account.
Once the needed certificate is signed and obtained funds will
immediately reflect in your bank within 10 Minutes,the
certificate is all that is needed to complete this
transaction.
Reconfirm your information below
Full NAME
Address
 International passport
Your WHATSAPP Phone Number is needed for further communication.
Finally, we are expecting to hear from you today unfailingly to enable
us serve you better
Thank you very much for your anticipated co-operation and understanding.
Best Regards
I await your Immediate response
Mr Johnson Clerk

subject: Re: Attn:
body:
Hello Mr. Johnson Clerk,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you taking the time to study my file and provide me with an update on the status of my funds. It's frustrating to hear that the fund has not been released despite having paid virtually all fees.

I understand that you are willing to help release the funds to me if I comply with certain requirements. Could you please provide more details about the Original Copy of the Fund Release Classified Document? What exactly does it entail, and how can I obtain it?

Additionally, could you clarify which paying officer will be responsible for transferring the funds into my bank account? It would be helpful to have their contact information or any other relevant details.

Here is my information as requested:
Full Name: 
Address: 
Passport: 
WhatsApp Phone Number: 

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter.

Best wishes,
Frances
